# Welcome to my website!

:::{#hero-heading}
:::

I'm a PhD candidate in the Fisheries and Aquatic Sciences program at the University of Florida. My areas of interest are mainly in seafood markets, sustainable consumption and nutritional effects on consumers. My dissertation is about incentives and product attributes in seafood markets.

--- 

My research papers and work in progress can be found [here!](research/index.qmd)
